group_1.textLeft: (Not like I remember it clearly, but…@I feel like…)
(I've found peace of mind after all…)

group_1.textCenter: Alright, I've gotta keep this short!
Sorry…@You won't get to see Mama anymore.
I think you're probably gonna face a lot of hardships@in the future.
I was a bad Mama right up til the end.@I'm so sorry…
But there's still one thing I can be proud of.
Mama is so happy to be able to protect you, Ryouko.
So, this just means I'm filled with happiness!
You have the cutest smile. I can't see it ‘cause@I'm on the phone, but I know you do.
Be a good girl! I love you! Good luck!

group_1.textRight: After this, the backup she called for got to the scene.
I heard she was still conscious and hanging on@at that point.
They took her to the hospital, but she died there.
Nobody ever told me what the incident was all about@in the end…
So this is just me guessing, but…
Your mother prevented a war that day.
Well, it wasn't guaranteed to happen,@but it wasn't unlikely, either.
Back then, some rabble-rousers were trying to start@a war.
Under the guise of "foreign operations",@they were planning a terrorist attack…
Your mother stopped their plans just before they@could be carried out…
a war would've broken out by now.
So your mother was trying to save@the Land of the Rising Sun from war…

group_1.textLeft: Maybe I'm takin' it wrong, but I thought it was like…
Mom wanted to save me from the war.
that's what it sounded like to me.
